paper_abstract: This article addresses the problem of robust H-infinity filter design of a class of Takagi-Sugeno fuzzy neutral systems with time-varying delays and norm-bounded parameter uncertainties. A fuzzy filter is constructed, which ensures both the robust stability and a prescribed H-infinity performance of the filtering error system. A linear matrix inequality approach is developed, and a delay-dependent sufficient condition is obtained. A simulation example is provided to demonstrate the effectiveness of the proposed approach.
paper_title: Robust H-infinity filter design of uncertain T-S fuzzy neutral systems with time-varying delays
